text:
e="preserve">Frank W. Christopherson Jr. (May 24, 1927 – December 15, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Wisconsin Senate from 1963 to 1967. He also was in the Wisconsin Assembly from 1959 to 1963. Christopherson Jr. was born in Superior, Wisconsin.
Christopherson Jr. died on December 15, 2020 in Duluth, Minnesota at the age of 93.
